name: Geometry Dash Tower Defense
description:
Geometry Dash Tower Defense is a Geometry Dash Fan-Game where instead of jumping over spikes, the spikes move across a road. Now, you have to get towers to shoot and destroy the spikes before they reach the other end! The game is endless but its considered a win when you get to round 50.

Song Used:

Panda Eyes - Highscore

Dedicated to:

RobTop

Warframe (he taught me how to code a tower defense game)

1.6 GDPS Members (my friends)
